EmailTemplate.name: 2013-ABC3-Tradeshow-St-Louis.Email-Blast
EmailTemplate.subject: Stop by for a visit in St. Louis!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Stop by for a Visit
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}, The Page, Wolfberg, & Wirth's XI (Executive Institute <http://www.pwwemslaw.com/content.aspx?id=476>) on May 20 and ABC3 Conference <http://www.pwwemslaw.com/content.aspx?id=582> on May 21-22 in St. Louis is right around the corner. TriTech will be exhibiting at the PWW conference at the Hyatt and we invite you to please stop by our booth and visit with our Client Account Manager, Brenda Taylor.
Stop by to see a sneak preview of what’s coming in our Respond Billing Version 5.9. Some exciting new features include Real-time Eligibility and Virtual Multi-Leg, along with many revisions to the Remittance Processing module.
Also talk with Brenda about how you can maximize the use of your Respond Billing product through continuing education, Billing Check Up, migrating to the Cloud, or just simple tweaks to your billing system.
See you in Vegas!
Questions? Contact your TriTech Account Manager for more information.
sales@tritech.com 800-537-3927
2013 Events We'll also be at the following events in 2013: - June 25-26: Respond Billing User Group <http://offers.tritech.com/2013SGTRegistration.html> (Evergreen, CO) - August 5-9: Pinnacle <http://pinnacle-ems.com/> (Jacksonville, FL) - September 4-5: Respond Billing User Group <http://offers.tritech.com/2013SGTRegistration.html> (West Columbia, TX) - October: PWW’s ABC3 Conference <http://www.pwwemslaw.com/content.aspx?id=582> (Hershey, PA) - November 6-7: Respond Billing User Group <http://offers.tritech.com/2013SGTRegistration.html> (Shelton, CT) - November 15-22: AAA Annual Conference <http://www.the-aaa.org/> (Las Vegas, NV)
